title: How Do I Friend People

replies.body: The feature of friending people is not added in the Avicus website. It will be implemented in the feature though.
replies.body_tagged: The feature of friending people is not added in the Avicus website. It will be implemented in the feature though.

replies.body: You can add people on the old website, here ;)) http://old.avicus.net/forums The friend requesting system hasn't been implemented yet.
